b.js(15,25): error TS8011: Type arguments can only be used in TypeScript files.
b.js(15,25): error TS8026: Expected A<T> type arguments; provide these with an '@extends' tag.


==== a.ts (0 errors) ====
    export class A<T> {}
    
==== b.js (4 errors) ====
    import { A } from './a.js';
    
    export class B1 extends A {
                            ~

        constructor() {
            super();
        }
    }
